name: Construction Training Program and Job Placement Services
description: The Construction Training Program (CTP) is a comprehensive 8-week, 40-hour per week pre-apprenticeship training program designed to prepare participants of any skill level for union employment in the construction industry. Working in partnership with San Francisco CityBuild, Construction Jobs Program’s has been developed to assist island contractors in fulfilling their 50% San Francisco and 25% Economically Disadvantaged hiring goals.
